modules.name: Data Privacy (GDPR/Sovereignty)
modules.description: Ensures compliance with data protection laws. Classify PII, define retention, and list third-party processors.
modules.trigger: Processing PII, user data, or changes to data retention policies.
modules.prompt: Do you process PII/User Data? (Adds Phase 3.5)

modules.name: Operations (Day 2 Readiness)
modules.description: Define Service Level Indicators (SLIs) and Runbooks. Ensure the feature is observable and maintainable.
modules.trigger: Launching a new service to production or significant changes to reliability guarantees.
modules.prompt: Do you need Operational Runbooks? (Adds Phase 8)
